Body:
mod = op.models.physics.ad_dif_conductance.ad_dif
self.phys.add_model(propname='throat.ad_dif_conductance_exponential', model
    =mod, s_scheme='exponential')
self.phys.regenerate_models()
self.ad.setup(conductance='throat.ad_dif_conductance_exponential')
self.ad.run()
x = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.89688173, 0.89688173, 0.89688173, 1.53952557, 
    1.53952557, 1.53952557, 2.0, 2.0, 2.0]
y = self.ad['pore.concentration']
assert_allclose(actual=y, desired=x)
